All Classes and Interfaces|All Packages|Serialized Form

C

checkBoat(ObjectOutputStream, String, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is called when a user wants to add a new boat, it checks if a boat with the same name is still into the database and returns a string (OK, KO) whether if it is found or not into the database.
checkEvent(ObjectOutputStream, Integer, Integer, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is used to check whether if an event is subscriptable or it has been still subscripted with another boat.
checkLogin(ObjectOutputStream, String, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is called at the system startup, when someone wants to login (via username and password), it checks the Existence of these credentials and returns the object Person containing all the informations about that user.
checkNotifications(ObjectOutputStream, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
It has the purpose to check if the expiring date of a precise payment is getting closer and, if yes, it will popup a notification whenever that user logs in.
checkUserExistence(ObjectOutputStream, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
It checks whether if one user is still subscripted when someone wants to register Controller_SignUp and return a byte (1) if the user is still in the database or (0) if not.
Client - Class in Socket
This class is the one which is started in order to open a client instance.
Client() - Constructor for class Socket.Client
 
ClientHandler - Class in Socket
This class manages the messages received by the client and redirects them to the server calling a precise method.
ClientHandler(Socket) - Constructor for class Socket.ClientHandler
It initializes the communication streams between the server and himself (clientHandler) and vice versa.
Controller_AddBoat - Class in Controller_FXML
This class contains all the method used inside the AddBoat GUI, when all the boat information are added by the user and the "SUBMIT" button is pressed, it will redirect the user to the Pay GUI in which the payment must be satisfied in order to successfully add the boat to the Database.
Controller_AddBoat() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_AddBoat
 
Controller_FXML - package Controller_FXML
This package contains all the .FXML files that manages the graphical side of the programme and then there are all the controllers that managed the logical part behind the GUI.
Controller_History - Class in Controller_FXML
This class contains all the method useful to show all the payment history, when the page is open a tableview is filled with all the past payments completed.
Controller_History() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_History
 
Controller_LogIN - Class in Controller_FXML
This class is the first that appears when the client is started; it shows all the fields in order to allow the user or manager to log in the system.
Controller_LogIN() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_LogIN
 
Controller_Manager - Class in Controller_FXML
This class has the purpose to manage the Manager GUI, it populates the tableview and allows the manager to delete or add a competition.
Controller_Manager() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_Manager
 
Controller_Notification - Class in Controller_FXML
This class has the purpose to manage the Notification GUI, it populates a tableview whether if the Notification database table has some row.
Controller_Notification() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_Notification
 
Controller_Partner - Class in Controller_FXML
This class is the most important, it contains all the logic in the user homepage.
Controller_Partner() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_Partner
 
Controller_Pay - Class in Controller_FXML
This class has the purpose to manage all the payment page and is called whenever a payment needs to be done.
Controller_Pay() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_Pay
 
Controller_PaymentHistory - Class in Controller_FXML
This class has the purpose to populate the Payment History GUI.
Controller_PaymentHistory() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_PaymentHistory
 
Controller_SignUp - Class in Controller_FXML
This class has the purpose to show all the option needed to add a new user.
Controller_SignUp() - Constructor for class Controller_FXML.Controller_SignUp
 
createEvent(ObjectOutputStream, String, Double, Double, String) - Static method in class Socket.Server
This method is called by the manager in order to add a new competition to the list and, then, allow other users to subscribe to it.
